definitions.definition: An illustration or artwork done with the use of paint.
definitions.example: The Mona Lisa is one of the most famous paintings.

definitions.definition: The action of applying paint to a surface.
definitions.example: The outside of the old house would benefit from some painting.

definitions.definition: The same activity as an art form.
definitions.example: Some artists, like Michelangelo, excel in both painting and sculpture.
